attributes.action: Stop all visitor flights from outside the UK and close our boarders.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the spreading of COVID-19 by stopping ALL visitor flights from landing in the UK. 

Businesses have been advised to close and people told to isolate in their homes for 14 days yet the Government is still allowing flights from some of the most infectious areas in the world to land in the UK.
attributes.background:
•Stop all visitor flights from outside of the UK to stop the spread of COVID-19 to citizens of the United Kingdom & Northern Ireland 

•All citizens returning to the UK no matter where from should be screened upon arrival at Airports and ports.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301188

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
